TopicTitle: Using laptop touchpad won't allow for zooming on map

Articles.Content:
Hi everyone,

 I haven't been using a mouse since I lost mine, and I can't seem to zoom in and out on the map or scroll in the SPH/VAB. Basically the two finger slide doesn't do anything. Is there a way I can make it work without having to purchase a mouse? My friend using a Mac can, but my Dell won't.

Thanks!

You can se the + and - buttons on the NumbPad to zoom, or the PgUp or PgDn to scroll up or down. If you don't have a numbpad, I don't know what you can do - try some different buttons. You might also have to activate or deactivate Num Lk. Hope this helped!
Thank you so much! Time for some real science now!
